name: ADTatYourService
0:
”Alexa, open ADT at your service”
”Alexa, launch ADT at your service”
”Alexa, ask ADT at your service about turn down service”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: a. d. t. at your service
des:
[Note: This is not the ADT app to control your ADT smart devices.] 

ADT At Your Service helps you learn more about secure smart home features and services that ADT can design, and install just for you! Whether you want more control of your home while away, or, want to integrate your ADT security solution with Alexa. It’s a secure smart solution, that all works together to bring greater control and convenience to your home.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
